summary: This is a Bureau of Prisons inmate housing history record for Leonardo Fernandez, showing his cell assignments and transfers within the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York and other facilities from April 2019 to August 2021. The document tracks his movements between different housing units, ranges, and beds.

keyFacts: Leonardo Fernandez was a federal inmate with registration number 86824-054 held in the Bureau of Prisons system.
The housing record shows frequent cell transfers between April 2019 and August 2021 across multiple facilities including MCC New York.
Fernandez was assigned to disciplinary segregation (DS) and administrative detention (AD) units at various points, indicating behavioral or security issues.
The document provides a detailed timeline of his incarceration movements, showing he was in custody continuously from at least April 2019 through August 2021.
